trans-unit.source: Represents an expression editor instance.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个表达式编辑器实例。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of an expression editor instance, see <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorService>.
trans-unit.target: 表达式编辑器实例的详细说明，请参阅<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorService>。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorService>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the expression editor instance accepts the RETURN key.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示表达式编辑器实例是否接受 RETURN 键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression editor accepts the RETURN key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果表达式编辑器接受 RETURN 键;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the expression editor instance accepts the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示表达式编辑器实例是否接受 TAB 键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression editor accepts the TAB key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果表达式编辑器接受 TAB 键;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can complete the string being typed by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，指示表达式编辑器实例是否可以完成用户键入的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Boolean>设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can be closed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示是否可以关闭表达式编辑器实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression editor instance can be closed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以关闭表达式编辑器实例;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression can be cut.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示是否可以剪切表达式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression can be cut; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以剪切表达式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the filter level can be decreased when using Intellisense filtering.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示在使用 Intellisense 筛选时是否可以降低筛选级别。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the filter level can be decreased; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以降低筛选级别;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can retrieve global IntelliSense on the expression.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，指示表达式编辑器实例是否可以检索表达式的全局 IntelliSense。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Boolean>设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the filter level can be increased when using Intellisense filtering.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示在使用 Intellisense 筛选时是否可以提高筛选级别。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the filter level can be increased; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以提高筛选级别;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can retrieve parameter information on the expression.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，指示表达式编辑器实例是否可以检索表达式的参数信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Boolean>设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression can be pasted.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示是否可以粘贴表达式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression can be pasted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以粘贴表达式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can retrieve type information to be shown in an IntelliSense quick info tool tip.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，指示表达式编辑器实例是否可以检索要显示在 IntelliSense 快速信息工具提示类型信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Boolean>设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the system can redo the operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示系统是否可以重做操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system can redo the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果系统可以重做操作;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the system can undo the operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示系统是否可以撤消该操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system can undo the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果系统可以撤消该操作;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Clears the selection in the editor instance.
trans-unit.target: 清除编辑器实例中的选择。

trans-unit.source: Closes and purges the editor items.
trans-unit.target: 关闭并清除编辑器项。

trans-unit.source: This will close the specific expression editor instance.
trans-unit.target: 这将关闭特定表达式编辑器实例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the expression editor instance is closing.
trans-unit.target: 关闭表达式编辑器实例时发生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the expression editor instance can provide a list of completions for the partial word typed by the user.
trans-unit.target: 确定表达式编辑器实例是否可以提供用户键入部分单词的完成列表。

trans-unit.source: For example, member, argument, and method names can be shown to the user in an attempt to help them complete the word they are typing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，成员、 参数和方法名称可以显示给用户以帮助他们完成正在键入的单词的尝试。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法成功，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the active expression.
trans-unit.target: 复制当前表达式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the copy is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果复制成功;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Cuts the active expression.
trans-unit.target: 剪切当前表达式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cut is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在转换成功;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Decreases the filter level to show all items in the Intellisense filter list and returns a value that indicates whether this operation was successful.
trans-unit.target: 降低筛选级别以显示 Intellisense 筛选列表中所有项，并返回一个值，该值指示此操作是否成功。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法成功，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets focus on the editor instance.
trans-unit.target: 将焦点设置在编辑器实例上。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text used to generate an expression.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于生成表达式的文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that contains the text used to generate an expression.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>，其中包含用于生成表达式的文本。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves global IntelliSense on the expression in the expression editor and returns a value that indicates whether this operation was successful.
trans-unit.target: 检索表达式编辑器中的表达式的全局 IntelliSense，并返回一个值，该值指示此操作是否成功。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法成功，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the expression editor instance has aggregate focus.
trans-unit.target: 表达式编辑器实例具有聚合焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the instance has aggregate focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此实例是否具有聚合焦点。

trans-unit.source: The instance has aggregate focus when the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> or any other control created by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> has focus.
trans-unit.target: 此实例具有聚合焦点<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A>或创建的任何其他控件<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A>具有焦点。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the editor instance has aggregate focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果编辑器实例具有聚合焦点，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the horizontal scrollbar is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示水平滚动条是否可见。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref> instance that can be used to display in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref>可以用于在中显示的实例<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Increases the filter level to show common items in the Intellisense filter list and returns a value that indicates whether this operation was successful.
trans-unit.target: 提高筛选级别以显示 Intellisense 筛选器列表中常见的项并返回一个值，该值指示此操作是否成功。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法成功，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Represents an event that is raised when the expression editor instance loses aggregate focus.
trans-unit.target: 表示表达式编辑器实例失去聚合焦点时引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: The instance loses aggregate focus when the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> and every control created by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> loose focus.
trans-unit.target: 此实例失去聚合焦点<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A>和创建的每个控件<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A>失去焦点。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of lines of text to be displayed by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示的文本行的最大数目<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property implicitly sets the height of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref> control when growing to fit.
trans-unit.target: 此属性会隐式设置的高度<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref>控制在增大以适合。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.MaxHeight%2A> is set, it will override `MaxLines`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.MaxHeight%2A>设置，它将替代`MaxLines`。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.MaxHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Int32> that containing the maximum number of lines of text to be displayed by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Int32>包含的最大的要显示的文本的行数<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref>控件。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum number of lines of text to be displayed by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示的文本行的最小数目<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property implicitly sets the height of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性会隐式设置的高度<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.MinHeight%2A> is set, then it will override MinLines.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.MinHeight%2A>设置，则它将替代 MinLines。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.MinHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns an<xref:System.Int32> that contains the minimum number of lines of text to be displayed by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Int32>包含的要显示的文本的行的最小数目<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref>控件。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves parameter information on the expression in the expression editor and returns a value that indicates whether this operation was successful.
trans-unit.target: 检索表达式编辑器中的表达式的参数信息，并返回一个值，该值指示此操作是否成功。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法成功，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Pastes the active expression.
trans-unit.target: 粘贴当前表达式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the paste is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成功，则对象，则粘贴否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether type information to be shown in an IntelliSense quick info tool tip.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否键入要显示在 IntelliSense 快速信息工具提示信息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法成功，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Reapplies the last operation that was undone in the editor, that is, reverse the effects of the undo operation.
trans-unit.target: 重新应用已撤消的上一个操作在编辑器中，即，反转撤消操作的效果。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the redo is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果重做操作是成功;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Represents an event that is raised when the text in an expression editor instance is changed.
trans-unit.target: 表示表达式编辑器实例中的文本更改时引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Undoes the last operation in the editor.
trans-unit.target: 撤消编辑器中的最后一个操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the undo is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果撤消成功;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the vertical scrollbar is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示垂直滚动条是否可见。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>.
